scripts.build:tests: cd programs && cargo wasi build -r && cd .. && cp programs/target/wasm32-wasi/release/*.wasi.wasm public/bin/tests/
scripts.build: npm run build:docs && npm run build:vite
scripts.test:cargo: cargo install cargo-wasi || echo Please install cargo to run the tests
scripts.test:download: wget --directory-prefix=public/bin/ https://github.com/caspervonb/wasi-test-suite/archive/refs/heads/main.zip && unzip -u public/bin/main.zip -d public/bin/ && rm public/bin/main.zip
scripts.test:prepare: npm run test:mkdir && npm run test:download && npm run test:cargo && npm run build:tests
